properties.name: Llanelli
properties.wheelchair:description: Wheelchair accessibility is difficult but possible. Eastbound (from Carmarthen to Swansea) access is through two sets of double-doors. Westbound (from Swansea to Carmarthen) and all Heart of Wales trains, access is through an unsignposted side lane.

properties.name: Welshpool
properties.wheelchair:description: Big long ramp to the train station village hours

properties.description: Llanfairpwll pronounced as Llan-vire-pooll Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch pronounced as Llan-vire-pooll-guin-gill-go-ger-u-queern-drob-ooll-llandus-ilio-gogo-goch
properties.name: Llanfairpwll
properties.note: Jocularly known as Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch - this is not the official name by which it is referred by Network Rail at http://nationalrail.co.uk/stations/LPG.html

properties.description:
This station is a request stop.

To alight from the train, please inform the conductor or the driver of your intentions in good time. 

To board the train at this station, please give a clear hand signal to the driver as the train approaches.
